original_text: I looked among the people for a man who would make the land safe. He would make it a good, strong place again, with nothing bad in it. Then I would not destroy it. But I could not find anyone like that.
korean_text: 이 땅을 위하여 성을 쌓으며 성 무너진 데를 막아 서서 나로 하여금 멸하지 못하게 할 사람을 내가 그 가운데에서 찾다가 찾지 못하였으므로

sentences.original_text: for a man who would make the land safe
He would make it a good, strong place again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳을 다시 좋고 강한 곳으로 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then I would not destroy it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 나는 그것을 멸하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: But I could not find anyone like that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그런 사람을 찾지 못했다
